description: Fecal sample from calorie-restricted human CRBM.05
experiment_design_description: Comparative metagenomic survey of gut microbiomes from 33 mammalian species, and 18 calorie-restricted humans, addressing the role of diet in shaping microbial communitry structure and function.
experiment_title: Diet drives convergence in gut microbiome functions across mammalian phylogeny and within humans
library_construction_protocol: Each fecal community DNA sample was randomly fragmented by nebulization to 400-800 bp, and then labeled with a distinct MID (Multiplex IDentifier; Roche) using the MID manufacturer?s protocol (general library preparation for FLX standard). Equivalent amounts of up to 12 MID-labeled samples were pooled prior to each pyrosequencer run.
title: human gut microbiome
